pull.title: [qa] gitignore: Remove unused lines
pull.body: Not sure what those lines are used for. Probably forgotten to be removed in previous pulls.

comments.body:
Well, I assume the goal was to provide `osx` builds one day...

Though, I am not sure on the eta of this and it can always be added back in later.
@laanwj Did Bitcoin Core use to use Java?
There was a component used for testing that was based on bitcoinj. It was finally removed (in favor of the internal Python based testing framework) in #8504
